work.name: Primordial
work.description: The main insipiration for the performance is C.G.Jung's ideas about consciousness, unconscious and archetypes. Performance is structured through different spaces physically aligning to to the structure (floors) of human consciousness and unconscious  “Primordial” is a collective ritual, dream which is created by everybody present in it - actor, participant and spectator.
work.performers:
Director: Karolina ŽERNYTĖ 
 Dramaturg: Jaunius PISARAVIČIUS 
 Scenographer: Šarūnė PEČIUKONYTĖ 
 Consultant-psychologist: Elona ILGIUVIENĖ 
 Consultant-composer: Mantvydas PRANULIS 
 Performers: Diana ANEVIČIŪTĖ, Adelė TERESIŪTĖ-AUKŠTIKALNĖ, Vaidotas BAČIANSKAS, Balys IVANAUSKAS, Aistė JANČIŪTĖ, Jurga KALVAITYTĖ, Artūras LEPIOCHINAS, Raminta ŠNIAUKŠTAITĖ, Eglė ŠPOKAITĖ

rider.language: The piece is in English without translation. There is no script of the piece.
rider.stage: Minimum size 12 meters per 12 meters. Black box. No dance floor.
rider.sound: 2 HF microphones hung on the performers’ T-shirts
